question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his/her help in arranging it
text: It was announced a campaign for capability enhancement on business skills such as enterprise risk management and problem-solving. Some employees around the world will be selected to spend 6 months on company's head in London. This is a great opportunity for my development and I believe this will enable increase my performance, resulting in a huge contribution to achieving the department's goals of delivering the projects faster and with lower costs.

During these six months, there will be some workshops with experts and opportunities to shadow senior leaders. It will be taken part-time, so I will have the other part-time free to continue the work I've been doing. In addition, Mike can support me with some administrative activities that do not need my direct efforts.

The selection for the program will start at the end of this month, only managers can subscribe employees for selection. I really appreciate it if you could support me on this initiative, indicating me and trusting in my potential for developing the skills required to contribute to the department's performance.
I hope to hear from you soon.
